question: Which of the following statements is incorrect?
option2: Samudragupta is known as Indian Napolean
option4: Kumaragupta restored the embankment of Sundarsana Lake
answer: Kumaragupta restored the embankment of Sundarsana Lake
explanation: Sudarshan Lake was dug by Tishap. He was the great patron of the emperor Ashoka, restored this lake and strengthened it. In later times Skandagupta spent a lot of money generously and constructed a dam on this lake.
